title: Whoopie pies with quark and peanut butter filling
ingredients: ['1 teaspoon bicarbonate of soda', '120ml hot water', '45g butter, at room temperature', '130g caster sugar', '1 1/2 teaspoons vanilla sugar', '1 egg', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '210g plain flour', '120ml buttermilk', '55g unsweetened cocoa', '60g creamy peanut butter', 'For the filling', '220g creamy peanut butter', '200g 0% quark', '3 tablespoons icing sugar', 'dark chocolate, cut into chunks']
